summary: I am Teal'c from the planet Chulak with 100 years experience.

roles.job: Title Closing Processor and Licensed Title Agent
tasks: Opened files for each new transaction, cash or finance, ordering both title and municipal lien searches.
Worked as part of a team consisting of both in-person co-workers and remote co-workers.

Examined title of  subject properties and worked on clearing every closing requirement needed for each, including titles to properties in probate, properties with open permits/city liens, and other complex situations.
Assisted and facilitated residential real estate closings, including e-closings.

experience.company: Gainesville Title, PLLC, A Law Firm

roles.job: Legal Assistant to Patrick Dodds, Esq.
tasks: Designed and implemented a company workflow that greatly increased efficiency in the handling of files.
Managed and maintained said workflow and was instrumental in the day-to-day operations of the firm.
Reviewed real estate closing contracts and created the file in our software, including ordering title search.
Cleared title deficiencies, including ordering estoppel letters, payoff statements, and surveys.
Recorded warranty deeds, affidavits, mortgages, etc. in the Official Records through e-file.

roles.job: Legal Assistant to Robert J. Warren, Esq.
tasks: Executed title work pertaining to real estate closings, including ordering title and clearing title deficiencies.
Collaborated with mortgage lenders to reconcile final settlement statements for real estate closings.
Maintained consistent communication with clients to ensure excellent customer service.
Processed screening and intake of bankruptcy clients and started their file in BestCase software.
Sat face-to-face with clients to guide them through their Chapter 7 bankruptcy petitions.
